reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Intensification and improvement of quality HIV interventions to reach the 95-95-95 target and scaling up of TB interventions to combat tuberculosis in Côte d’Ivoire

description.narrative: Côte d'Ivoire - TB/HIV - Alliance Nationale pour la Santé et le Développement en Côte D'Ivoire - Alliance Côte d'Ivoire. This program has the following goals: Réduire le nombre de décès lié à la tuberculose de 60 % à l’horizon 2025 par rapport à l’année 2015 / Reduce the number of deaths from tuberculosis by 60% by 2025 compared to the year 2015.. Réduire l’incidence de la tuberculose de 50% à l’horizon 2025 par rapport à l’année 2015 / Reduce the incidence of tuberculosis by 50% by the year 2025 compared to the year 2015.. En 2025, les nouvelles infections à VIH sont réduites de 70% (en prenant compte année de base 2020) / In 2025, new HIV infections are reduced by 70% (taking into account baseline year 2020). En 2025, la mortalité liée au VIH est réduite de 50% (en prenant compte année de base 2020) / In 2025, HIV-related mortality is reduced by 50% (taking into account baseline year 2020). The objectives of this program are: Accroître la notification des nouveaux cas et rechutes de tuberculose toutes formes de 21 034 en 2018 à 25 754 en 2023 / Increase the notification of new cases and relapses of all forms of tuberculosis from 21,034 in 2018 to 25,754 in 2023.. Atteindre 90% de taux de succès thérapeutique chez les nouveaux cas et rechutes de tuberculose toutes formes d’ici 2023 / Achieve 90% treatment success rate in new and relapsed cases of all forms of tuberculosis by 2023.. Atteindre 84% de taux de succès thérapeutique chez les malades multi-résistants mis sous traitement de 2ème ligne d’ici 2023 / Achieve 84% treatment success rate in multi-drug resistant patients put on 2nd line therapy by 2023. Intensifier et améliorer la qualité des interventions en vue de l'atteinte des 95-95-95 d'ici 2025 / Accelerate and improve the quality of interventions to achieve the 95-95-95 by 2025. La réduction de la stigmatisation et de la discrimination et le respect des droits humains renforcent l'ensemble des interventions de prévention et de prise en charge du VIH/sida / Reduced stigma and discrimination, and respect for human rights reinforce all HIV / AIDS prevention and care interventions. Renforcer les capacités de gestion et de coordination du programme à tous les niveaux / Strengthen programme management and coordination capacities at all levels. La gouvernance de la réponse au VIH/sida et aux IST est renforcée à tous les niveaux pour en assurer l’accélération, l'efficience, la redevabilité et la durabilité / The governance of the HIV / AIDS response and STIs is strengthened at all levels to ensure acceleration, efficiency, accountability and sustainability. Il s'agira spécifiquement de Renforcer les parties prenantes à la fois sur la participation et la redevabilité citoyenne dans les systèmes de prestations de services.

receiver-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Treatment success rate- all forms: Percentage of TB cases, all forms, bacteriologically confirmed plus clinically diagnosed, successfully treated (cured plus treatment completed) among all TB cases registered for treatment during a specified period, new and relapse cases
HTS-Other 1 Percentage of MSM newly diagnosed with HIV and enrolled in an ARV treatment site during the reporting period
Number of TB cases (all forms) notified among prisoners
RHRB-Other 1 Percentage of PLHIV, people with TB and key populations receiving legal and/or judicial assistance
HTS-Other 2 Percentage of sex workers newly diagnosed with HIV and enrolled in an ARV treatment site during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
KP-Other 1 Percentage of drug users (including PWID) who have benefited from preventive HIV programs - defined package of services
Number of notified TB cases (all forms) contributed by non-national TB program providers – community referrals
Percentage of other vulnerable populations that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
HTS-Other 3 Percentage of drug users (including PWID) newly diagnosed with HIV and enrolled in an ARV treatment site during the reporting period
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
